Detailed Description

Offers logging.

Member Function Documentation

static wxExLog* wxExLog::Get ( bool  createOnDemand = true  )  [static]

Returns the global log object.

The global file logging is default turned off.

static wxExLog* wxExLog::Set ( wxExLog *  log  )  [static]

Sets the object as the current one, returns the pointer to the previous current object (both the parameter and returned value may be NULL).

void wxExLog::SetLogging ( bool  logging = true  ) 

Sets logging as specified.

If the logging is true and the logfile does not exist, it is created.
